page.title: 03FARMS IN THE AREA
page.content:
Farming is the principal activity in the block with the following farmsteads: { Lambside Farm, { Poole Farm, { Caulston Farm, { Carswell Farm { Great Prideaux Farm, { Keaton Farm.
Fifty percent of the cultivated land is given over to grass crops, Silage, Hay, Grazing for sheep and beef and dairy cattle. The intensively managed grass land extends almost to the seacliff with only a very narrow strip of rough grazing along the cliff. The remaining fifty percent of the land is cultivated as cereal or root crops e.g.: Wheat, barley, kale and some crops for seed on{Netton Farm.
